validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

sessionExpired.title: Session Expired
sessionExpired.description: For security reasons, your session has expired. Please log in again to continue.

forgotPassword.title: Recover Password

forgotPassword.successMessage: An email with instructions to reset your password has been sent. If your account exists in our system, you'll receive the email within the next few minutes.
forgotPassword.spamNotice: If you don't find it in your inbox, check your spam or junk folder.
forgotPassword.newWindowNotice: You can continue from the link in the email which will open in a new window.

error.title: Error
error.unknown: An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again.

resetPassword.successMessage: Your password has been updated successfully. You can now log in with your new password.
resetPassword.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
resetPassword.passwordComplexity: Password must contain at least one uppercase, one lowercase, and one number

error.title: Error Resetting Password

list.title: Machine Management

photo.title: Machine Photo
photo.description: Add a representative photo of the machine to facilitate its identification.
photo.label: Photo
photo.helperText: Supported formats: JPEG, PNG, WebP. Maximum size: 5MB. The image will be uploaded upon registration confirmation.
photo.addLaterDescription: You can upload the photo from the machine details page after registration.

screen.title: Register New Machine
screen.subtitle: Complete the information in the following steps to register a new machine in the system.
screen.loadErrorDescription: Check your connection or try reloading.

basicInfo.name: Reference Name
basicInfo.tip: <0>Tip:</0> Make sure the serial number is unique and visible on the machine. This information will be essential for tracking and maintenance.

technicalSpecs.title: Technical Specifications
technicalSpecs.assignedToHelper: Person responsible for this machine (operator, supervisor, etc.)
technicalSpecs.usageScheduleDescription: Define how many hours per day the machine operates and which days of the week. This information is used to calculate automatic maintenance alerts.
technicalSpecs.dailyHoursHelper: Average hours it operates per day (1-24)
technicalSpecs.operatingDaysHelper: Select the days when this machine typically operates
technicalSpecs.weeklyHoursInfo: This schedule will be used to calculate maintenance alerts based on actual usage hours.
technicalSpecs.attachmentsPlaceholder: E.g.: Hydraulic hammer, Excavation bucket, Hydraulic thumb
technicalSpecs.specialFeaturesPlaceholder: E.g.: Air conditioning system, Integrated GPS, Backup camera
technicalSpecs.isActiveHelper: Indicates whether the machine is currently in operational use
technicalSpecs.note: <0>Note:</0> Only the manufacturing year is required. The rest of the fields will help you have better control and tracking of your machines in the system.

confirmation.title: Confirm the information

confirmation.photoLaterInfo: You can upload the photo from the details page after registration
confirmation.goBackToFix: Please go back to previous steps to correct these errors.
confirmation.finalMessage: By clicking "Register Machine", a new record will be created in the system. This information can be edited later from machine management.

_comment_1: IMPORTANT: 'notifications' (plural) = UI strings (screen, buttons, filters). 'notification' (singular) = backend SSE messages with {{interpolation}}. DO NOT merge - intentional separation.
